item.title: About Me
item.description: I am avid gamer. I play a lot of stuff, mostly singleplayer games, but I play Dota 2 the most, other coop games like Payday 2, and racing games.
item.content: I am avid gamer. I play a lot of stuff, mostly singleplayer games, but I play Dota 2 the most, other coop games like Payday 2, and racing games.

Education

Education

Skills

Programming Languages:

  • Proficent in Python and Fortran
  • Experience in HTML

Graphics:

  • Experience in Adobe Photoshop and Premiere as well as Gimp

Problem Solving:

  • Strong problem-solving skills with a logical and analytical approach
  • Experience in troubleshooting and debugging complex technical issues

Communication:

  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders effectively

Teamwork:

  • Proven ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams to achieve project goals.

Continuous Learning:

  • Passionate about learning new technologies and staying updated with industry trends.
  • Dedication to self-improvement and skill enhancement through online courses, workshops, and projects.

Hobbies

  • Video Games
  • Coding
  • Making content
  • Music
  • Tinkering with technology
